item.title: chore: husky: husky,gitleakでsecretの流出チェック

item.title: add: remove CDATA
item.content:encoded:
.github/workflows/generate_rss.yml
- name: Setup Environment run: | # echo "NODE_PATH=${{ github.workspace }}/node_modules" >> $GITHUB_ENV # echo "PATH=${{ github.workspace }}/node_modules/.bin:$PATH" >> $GITHUB_ENV
- name: Setup pnpm uses: pnpm/action-setup@v4 with: version: latest
- name: install Packages run: |
item.author: atsushifx@gmail.com (Furukawa Atsushi)

item.title: fix: type '_' missing
item.author: atsushifx@gmail.com (Furukawa Atsushi)

item.title: fix: commit2feed
item.description:
fix: commit2feed
commit2feed: remove CDATA tag pair from content
item.content:encoded:
rss/feeds.xml
<lastBuildDate>Tue, 28 May 2024 08:48:58 GMT</lastBuildDate> <link>https://github.com/atsushifx/commit2feed/commit/85809ef6279e2e6e8fd1f71b694ca99872c7d091</link> <guid>85809ef6279e2e6e8fd1f71b694ca99872c7d091</guid> <description><![CDATA[fix: generator type update: output as rss2 use pnpm fix: pnpm not use cache]]></description> <content:encoded><![CDATA[.github/workflows/generate_rss.yml
------ package-lock.json
item.author: atsushifx@gmail.com (Furukawa Atsushi)

item.title: fix: pnpm not use cache
item.content:encoded:
.github/workflows/generate_rss.yml
------ rss/feeds.xml
<rss version="2.0" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:content="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/content/"> <channel> <title>atsushifx / commit2feed</title> <link>https://api.github.com/repos/atsushifx/commit2feed/commits/latest</link> <description>Latest 10 commits for atsushifx / commit2feed</description> <lastBuildDate>Tue, 28 May 2024 08:25:46 GMT</lastBuildDate> <docs>https://validator.w3.org/feed/docs/rss2.html</docs> <generator>https://github.com/atsushifx/commit2feed</generator> <item> <title><![CDATA[fix: generator type]]></title> <link>https://github.com/atsushifx/commit2feed/commit/4c4e47958c0083be8429b9001a51a54e174f643b</link> <guid>4c4e47958c0083be8429b9001a51a54e174f643b</guid>
item.author: atsushifx@gmail.com (Furukawa Atsushi)

item.title: fix: generator type
item.description: fix: generator type update: output as rss2 use pnpm fix: pnpm not use cache
item.content:encoded:
.github/workflows/generate_rss.yml
------ package-lock.json
------ package.json
"compile": "pnpm exec babel src --out-dir dist", "release": "pnpm exec ncc build ./dist/main.js -o release -m ", "build": "pnpm compile && pnpm release", "jsdoc": "pnpx jsdoc -c ./jsdoc.config.json", "test": "cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=\"--experimental-vm-modules\" pnpx jest", "lint": "pnpx eslint src/**.js --fix", "format": "pnpx prettier src/**.js --write" "src/*.js": "ppnpx eslint --fix", "**.js*": "ppnpx prettier --write"
item.author: atsushifx@gmail.com (Furukawa Atsushi)

item.title: use pnpm/make release
item.content:encoded:
package-lock.json
------ package.json
"compile": "pnpm exec babel src --out-dir dist", "release": "pnpm exec ncc build ./dist/main.js -o release -m ", "build": "pnpm compile && pnpm release", "jsdoc": "pnpx jsdoc -c ./jsdoc.config.json", "test": "cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=\"--experimental-vm-modules\" pnpx jest", "lint": "pnpx eslint src/**.js --fix", "format": "pnpx prettier src/**.js --write" "src/*.js": "ppnpx eslint --fix", "**.js*": "ppnpx prettier --write"
item.author: atsushifx@gmail.com (Furukawa Atsushi)
